titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the King at White-Hall, January the 9th 1675[/]6 By Thomas Cartwright, D.D. chaplain in ordinary to His Majesty. Published by His Majesties special command.
titleStmt.author: Cartwright, Thomas, 1634-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: In the Savoy: printed by T. Newcomb, and are to be sold by Jonathan Edwyn, at the Three Roses in Ludgate-street,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached St. Jude 22, 23. St. Jude 22, 23. at White-Hall.
Identified on UMI microfilm as Wing C702, but is actually C702B.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
